Class Enemy

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(float x,
             float y,
             processing.core.PApplet app,
             processing.core.PImage enemyImg,
             float speed,
             float health,
             float mana_gained_on_kill,
             float armor,
             java.util.ArrayList<float[]> pathToGo,
             Tile wiz,
             Mana mana)
        Constructor called whenever Enemy object is created.
        Parameters:
        x - float indicating x position.
        y - float indicating y position.
        app - a reference of PApplet passed to allow this class to call relevant drawing functions.
        enemyImg - PImage of the sprite.
        speed - float indicating movement speed of the enemy.
        health - float indicating total health of the enemy.
        mana_gained_on_kill - float indicating how much mana player gains when this enemy dies.
        armor - float indicating damage reduction.
        pathToGo - arraylist of float arrays giving the coordinates of the points the enemy will move to.
        wiz - Tile object that indicates the end of the path.
        mana - reference to the mana bar to allow increasing or decreasing of manabar depending on enemy state.

    • Method Detail

      • movement

        public void movement()
        If the enemy position is at the end tile position, then reset the position to the original x and y positions and reset pathIndex to 0.

        Starting at a pathIndex of 0, iterate through path arraylist, making the current index of the arraylist the current target, calculates distance between enemy and current target and moves according to the speed towards the target until it reaches. If the current target is reached, pathIndex is incremented and repeats until enemy x and y position matches the end tile x and y positions.

      • display

        public void display()
        Displays the enemy if health is not equal to 0. If the health is equal to 0, the enemy stops moving by setting speed to 0, and if not dead, calls die() function. Otherwise, stops displaying.

      • checkReachHouse

        public boolean checkReachHouse()
        Checks if current x and y positions are equal to the end tile x and y positions.
        Returns:
        boolean of whether x and y positions match.

      • drawHealth

        public void drawHealth()
        Draws 2 health bars on top of the enemy sprite to indicate health bar, health mar scales depending on the current health / maximum health.

      • getHealth

        public float getHealth()
        Returns value of the current health of the enemy.
        Returns:
        float of current health.

      • getMaxHealth

        public float getMaxHealth()
        Returns value of the maximum health of the enemy.
        Returns:
        float of max health.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Returns value of dead attribute.
        Returns:
        boolean if dead or not.

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Returns the value of the x attribute.
        Returns:
        float of the x value

      • getY

        public float getY()
        Returns the value of the y attribute.
        Returns:
        float of the y value

      • getArmour

        public float getArmour()
        Returns value of the armor attribute.
        Returns:
        float of the armor value.

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(float dmg)
        Decreases the current health according to value passed. If the current health - value is less than 0, the health is set to 0 instead.
        Parameters:
        dmg - float value indicating how much to decrease health by.

      • checkDead

        public boolean checkDead()
        Returns true if health is 0, if health is 0, die() function is run and return true. Otherwise returns false.
        Returns:
        true if health equals 0, otherwise false.

      • die

        public void die()
        Updates the sprite image every 4 frames to display the death animation. Once the death animation is complete, change the dead attribute value to true, and add mana_gained_on_kill attribute to mana reference.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Sets the paused value to true, and sets speed to the pausespeed.

      • unpause

        public void unpause()
        Sets the paused value to false, and sets speed to the normal speed.

      • ff

        public void ff()
        Sets the ffed value to true, and sets speed to the fast forwarded speed.

      • unff

        public void unff()
        Sets the ffed value to false, and sets speed to the normal speed.
